abstract:
Recently, bipolar fuzzy graph is a growing research topic as it is the generalization of fuzzy graphs. In this paper, at first
we define three new operations on bipolar fuzzy graphs, viz. direct product, semi strong product and strong product. Likewise,
sufficient conditions for each one of them to be complete are given. Also, it is proved that any of the products of strong bipolar
fuzzy graphs are strong bipolar fuzzy graphs.
meta: January 2015Journal of Intelligent and Fuzzy Systems 28:571â€“580
